Beard Tracker Privacy Policy

Taylor Ivanoff built the Beard Tracker App as a Free app. This App is provided by Taylor Ivanoff at no cost and is intended for use as is.

Face Data

Beard Tracker App stores pictures of your face within the local storage of your iOS device.

Your Face Data is then locally used to create a timelapse that is saved to your local Photos Library. Your Face Data is never transmitted from your device nor shared with any third-parties.

Furthermore, your Face Data is never retained, so once you delete the Beard Tracker App from your device all Face Data stored locally is also removed.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or suggestions about my Privacy Policy, contact me at taylorivanoff@gmail.com.
